# Website Desa Tanjung Rambutan - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a village government website built with:
- **Frontend**: React.js with Vite for modern development
- **Backend**: WordPress as Headless CMS 
- **Purpose**: Official website for Desa Tanjung Rambutan

## Architecture
- **Headless WordPress**: Content management via WordPress admin dashboard
- **React Frontend**: Modern, responsive user interface
- **REST API**: WordPress REST API for data communication
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach

## Key Features
- Village information and profiles
- News and announcements management
- Photo gallery
- Government structure display
- Contact information and services
- Admin-friendly content management

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React patterns (hooks, functional components)
- Follow WordPress REST API best practices
- Implement responsive design with CSS Grid/Flexbox
- Use TypeScript for better code quality
- Implement proper error handling and loading states
- Follow accessibility standards

## Setup Requirements
- Node.js 18+ for React development
- WordPress installation (local or hosted)
- Modern browser for development and testing
